    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu(int sizeX, int sizeY, int n_robots, Robot initialRobot, int typeOfMenu)
      Function to show the menu depending on the information we have to provide
      Parameters:
      sizeX - : X size of the tableau
      sizeY - : Y size of the tableau
      n_robots - : number of robots in the plateau
      initialRobot - : robot of the actual loop
      typeOfMenu - : type of the menu is it going to show

      Parameters:
      robotToMove - : Robot is going to do the action
      mov - : Action is going to do, M = Movement, R/L= Rotation

      ori - : Orientation of the robot

    • rotate

      public static String rotate(String actualOri, String rotation)
      Function to rotate the orientation of the robot
      Parameters:
      actualOri - : Actual orientation of the robot
      rotation - : Direction which has the robot to rotate
      Returns:
      New orientation of the robot

    • checkingSizeTableau

      public static int checkingSizeTableau(String[] checkStr)
      Function to check if the user has choose a correct format size of the tableau
      Parameters:
      checkStr - : String of the values to check
      Returns:
      NO_ERR: No error / ERR_SINTAXIS: Error writing the format of the tableau / ERR_BOUNS: Can not exist a tableau with negative or 0 size

    • checkNumeric

      public static int checkNumeric(String value)
      Function to check if the pass value is an Integer
      Parameters:
      value - : Value to check
      Returns:
      NO_ERR: No error / ERR_NULL: The value is null / ERR_FORMAT: Is not an integer

    • checkOrientation

      public static int checkOrientation(String value)
      Function to check the correct format of the orientation
      Parameters:
      value - : Value to check
      Returns:
      NO_ERR: No error / ERR_SINTAXIS:Error writing the correct value

    • checkInitialPos

      public static int checkInitialPos(String[] checkStr)
      Function to check if the user has choose a correct format initial position
      Parameters:
      checkStr - : String of the values to check
      Returns:
      NO_ERR: No error / ERR_SINTAXIS: Error writing the format of the tableau / ERR_BOUNDS: Error of the bounds of the tableau / ERR_COLISION: Error for choosing an occupied point
